channel.title: Testscape source
channel.description: My testscape source I am using won't let me change player rights or xp or cmb lvl I compile them and all and I get nuthing but the xp I hva earned from playing the game any help appreciated ty

item.title: Testscape source
item.dc:creator: @Duhsmersh Duhsmersh
item.description:
@Duhsmersh wrote:

private_servers_own:

My testscape source I am using won’t let me change player rights or xp or cmb lvl I compile them and all and I get nuthing but the xp I hva earned from playing the game any help appreciated ty

To change those things, go to “characters” folder, then click on the character profile you want to edit then it’ll say “character-rights = 0” where it has 0 change it to 1 for mod 2 for admin 3 for owner. once you x-out that window it will say “do you want to save your current settings?” (or something like that) click “yes.” that will save all you’ve done. then compile and run. if it doesn’t work it might be the compiler. i use Mod Tharok’s ‘perfect’ compiler 1.6, try using that if it doesn’t work.

Read full topic

then where it probably says some1 elses char change it to yours.
